actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-322.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1646) to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 and the Railroad Retirement Tax Act to assure sufficient resources to pay current and future benefits under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974, to make technical changes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1646 (railroad employees).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1646) to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 and the Railroad Retirement Tax Act to assure sufficient resources to pay current and future benefits under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974, to make technical changes, and for other purposes.
